name: Unterrogation
description:
U n t e r r o g a t i o n O V E R V I E W

Play as Detective C as you try to uncover who’s responsible for taking one of your precinct’s memory-erasing neuralyzers. Interrogate and explore the precinct as you and your fish buddy try to catch others in lies! You've got one shot to figure out the true culprit, so make it count. Something seems up? Wipe their memory and dig deeper. 

Created as a VGDC Quarter-Long Project: Wildcard.

G E N E R A L  C O N T R O L S

[WASD] = Movement

[Spacebar] = Interact

[R] = Toggle Text Loader

[Esc] = Pause Menu

T H E  T E A M

Production:  Nathan Lacsamana  |  Michael Shaneman

Game Design:  Nathan Lacsamana | Nathan More

Programming : Nathan More  |  Josh Castillo  |  Logan Mikulski

Background Music:  Tim Kashani
